title.en: The Lung of the Verdant Abyss

description.ko: 어두운 수중 숲에서 생물 발광 에너지를 내뿜으며 호흡하는 이끼 기반 유기체의 정교한 탐구.
description.en: A highly detailed exploration of a living, breathing moss-based organ pulsing with bioluminescent energy in a dark underwater forest.

prompt: A microscopic cinematic view of a breathing respiratory-like organ made of translucent #7FB069 emerald moss and #2D5A3D dark-green vascular networks, pulsing with rhythmic #FFE66D liquid light. The structure is suspended in a deep underwater atmosphere with #E6F2E1 floating bioluminescent spores. Heavy subsurface scattering on the organic membranes creates a soft, living glow. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Cinematic volumetric light shafts pierce through the water, highlighting the fluid flow of organic energy through the mossy fibers and the microscopic texture of the breathing light of nature.
